src:
国油提高资本开销提振  Velesto和Bumi Armada火热走高
07 Nov 2019, 03:36 by Wong Swee May
（吉隆坡7日讯）利好消息带动，Velesto Energy Bhd和Bumi Armada Bhd今早交投火热中攀升。
Velesto一度上扬1.5仙或3.9%，至40仙，截至11时15分报39.5仙，起1仙或2.6%，达4266万5400股易手，是第二大热门。
Bumi Armada则挂45.5令吉，起0.5仙或1.11%，最高升1仙或2.22%，至46仙，共1926万6400股成交，为第九热门。
大马大华继显分析员Kong Ho Meng指出，领先指标，即自升式钻井平台数量，比今年初有所增加，表明上游活动有所改善。
另一方面，这些公司的股价受到积极的领先指标以及国家石油（Petronas）在下半年提高资本开销的提振。
他表示，大马和联合开发区的自升式钻机数量从今年2月的9台，增加到9月的16台。
不过，他指出，油气股能否持续上升，取决于国油将于12月发布的《2020-2022年活动展望》。
“否则，股票收益可能会下降，投资者应该会套利。”
艾芬黄氏资本研究分析员Tan Jianyuan在周一（4日）的报告中，鼓励投资者趁行业升温套利，因为今年第四季和第一季是季节性疲软时期（受季候风影响）。
他表示，企业收益将成为本月的重点，而且维修和钻机业者可能因受益于高工作流量，而发布更强的第三季业绩。
Tan表示，艾芬黄氏资本研究也喜欢那些拥有良好盈利可见度的公司，如戴乐集团（Dialog Group Bhd）、Serba Dinamik Holdings Bhd、Velesto、Bumi Armada及科艺集团（Kelington Group Bhd）。
“但是，鉴于最近行业增长以及我们研究的部分股项接近其合理价值，我们建议在即将发布的第三季强劲业绩套利，因为第四季和第一季是季节性疲软时期（受季候风影响）。”
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Velesto and Bumi Armada active, rise on national oil firm’s guidance of higher capex

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Petronas raises capital spending boosts Velesto and Bumi Armada
07 Nov 2019, 03:36 by Wong Swee May
KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Velesto Energy Bhd and Bumi Armada Bhd climbed this morning with good news.
Velesto once rose 1.5 cents or 3.9% to 40 sen, as of 11:15, 39.5 sen, from 1 sen or 2.6%, reaching 42.66 million 5400 shares changed hands, is the second most popular.
Bumi Armada hangs 45.5 ringgit, starting at 0.5 sen or 1.11%, up 1 sen or 2.22%, to 46 sen, a total of 19.26 million 6400 shares, the ninth hot.
According to Kong Ho Meng, an analyst at Da Ma Dahua, the leading indicator, the number of jack-up rigs, has increased from the beginning of the year, indicating an improvement in upstream activities.
On the other hand, the share prices of these companies were positively boosted by the leading indicators and the increase in capital spending by Petronas in the second half of the year.
He said that the number of jack-up rigs in Malaysia and the joint development zone increased from 9 in February this year to 16 in September.
However, he pointed out that whether oil and gas stocks will continue to rise depends on the "Vision Outlook for 2020-2022" that Petronas will release in December.
“Otherwise, stock returns may fall and investors should arbitrage.”
In a report on Monday (4th), Affin Huang's research analyst Tan Jianyuan encouraged investors to arbitrage in the industry because the fourth quarter and the first quarter of this year were seasonally weak (affected by the monsoon).
He said that corporate earnings will be the focus of this month, and repair and rig operators may be able to release stronger third-quarter results by benefiting from high workflow.
Tan said that Affin Huang Capital Research also likes companies with good profitability, such as Dialog Group Bhd, Serba Dinamik Holdings Bhd, Velesto, Bumi Armada and Kelington Group Bhd.
“However, given the recent industry growth and the fact that some of the stocks we studied are close to their reasonable value, we recommend a strong performance arbitrage in the upcoming third quarter, as the fourth and first quarters are seasonally weak (affected by the monsoon) )."
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Velesto and Bumi Armada active, rise on national oil firm’s guidance of higher capex

Via theedgemarkets.com
